Title: Relates to investment standards for investments of the New York State college choice tuition savings program and the New York achieving a better life experience (ABLE) savings account program
Summary: Relates to investment standards for investments of the New York State college choice tuition savings program and the New York achieving a better life experience (ABLE) savings account program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the investment standard for investments of the New York state college choice tuition savings program and the New York achieving a better life experience (ABLE) savings account program
